article.title: Lockheed Martin to Manage Fort Bragg's FLRC
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has won a new contract to manage the Field Logistics Readiness Center (FLRC) at Fort Bragg, North Carolina. The contract is valued at $203 million over a five-year period of performance and was awarded under the Field & Installation Readiness Support Team contract vehicle.
